name: Tengoku Zero: Gasta Stones (Sixth) War
description:
Tengoku Zero : Gasta Stones (Sixth) War

This is my first scroller 2d game and this is the first game that took place in the Scoin Universe, a new Universe.

 You will view the 3 different points of 3 families in the Gasta Stones Sixth War !

 This game is situated between The Great Legend Anime School Angel Battlefront  School Revolution and Crash Duck.
